alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 11:13AM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yazoo River At Yazoo City affecting Yazoo County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yazoo River At Yazoo City. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Minor over bank is flooding is occurring along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 28.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 30.0 feet by Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Yazoo River Yazoo City 29.0 28.7 Thu 10 am CS 29.2 29.7 30.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued tonight at 8 pm CST.
